nodes.text: Mubasa sauce was a spicy sauce which could be consumed by members of the Hutt species. In 1 ABY, the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure ate a live gorg, an amphibious creature which had been coated in mubasa sauce, while he questioned a Trandoshan bounty hunter named Bossk in the Hutt's palace on the planet Tatooine.

Mubasa sauce first appeared in Rebel Force: Renegade, a novel released in 2009 and written by Alex Wheeler. It is not clear if there is any connection between the sauce and Mubasa hock, a food which has appeared in several other sources.
